dict.acceptation: 我们的，we的所有格形式； <口>我们家；敝；

sent.orig: Our economy continues to grow, our financial foundation remains solid, our society remains pluralistic, and our politicians continue to debate openly on all the topical issues.
sent.trans: 香港的经济继续蓬勃增长，财政基础依然稳固，社会维持多元化。

sent.orig: There's no pleasing our teacher, he always grumbles about our work even when we've done our best.
sent.trans: 没有办法取悦我们的老师，他总是埋怨我们的学业不好，即使我们竭尽努力也不行。

sent.orig: Bandits broke into our house and stole all our money.
sent.trans: 强盗闯入我们的住宅，偷走了所有的钱。

sent.orig: From then on we raised our heads and became our own masters.
sent.trans: 从此我们抬起头来当家做主了。

sent.orig: How does our product stack up against those of our competitors?
sent.trans: 我们的产品与我们的竞争者的产品比起来如何？
